definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to knock against/to bump into/to run into/to meet by accident

sentences.english: Unexpectedly the fault knocks a mistake to bump of dropped to in the fuel bulb, the cloth is flamed a hole.
sentences.chinese: 没想到误打误撞的就掉到了油灯上，布料被烧了个洞。

sentences.english: Made the mistake, one can also receive a spirit beast?
sentences.chinese: 误打误撞，人也能收了当灵兽？

sentences.english: Some of the best things that a city has to offer can be found by mistake.
sentences.chinese: 城市里有些绝佳景点可能是误打误撞发现的。

sentences.english: Hit by accident bump to be discovered by Li Qi by accident evidence.
sentences.chinese: 误打误撞被李齐一发现证据。

sentences.english: Two people are hit by accident bump into by accident for a pair of sweethearts.
sentences.chinese: 两人误打误撞成为了一对情侣。

definition: (idiom) due to an unexpected turn of events
to succeed by a lucky stroke
(idiom) due to an unexpected turn of events
to profit from a disaster (idiom); some good comes out of a setback/It's an ill wind that blows nobody any good.
a blind cat finds a dead mouse (idiom)/blind luck
pinyin: xia1 mao1 peng4 shang4 si3 hao4 zi5

definition: too bad/unfortunately/as luck would have it
nine deaths and still alive (idiom); a narrow escape/new lease of life
